G

GameEngine - Class in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse
GameEngine is where almost everything from the other classes contribute to the game.
GameEngine() - Constructor for class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameEngine
The default constructor for GameEngine.
gameLoop() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameEngine
The main loop of the game, this is where all the checks and actions go.
GameObject - Class in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse
This method is the super class for all game objects: Player, Enemy, Shield, Room, Radar, and ExtraAmmo.
GameObject() - Constructor for class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameObject
The constructor sets the default name for GameObject.objName, GameObject.realName, and GameObject.hiddenName.
GameObject(String, int, int) - Constructor for class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameObject
This method is only called for the Player, it instantiates the Player's position
gameOver - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameEngine
Checks to see if the game is over

Grid - Class in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse
This class deals with all GameObjects on the 9x9 grid that the game takes place on.
